mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN bn.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(bn.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(bn.borrow_period, '个月') END AS productStyle FROM ht_borrow_tender te LEFT JOIN ht_borrow bn ON te.borrow_nid = bn.borrow_nid WHERE te.nid = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and te.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT CASE WHEN hdp.is_month = '0' THEN CONCAT(hdpa.lock_period, '天') WHEN hdp.is_month = '1' THEN CONCAT(hdpa.lock_period, '个月') END AS productStyle FROM ht_hjh_accede hdpa LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_plan hdp ON hdpa.plan_nid = hdp.plan_nid WHERE hdpa.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hdpa.accede_order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
